data.eml:eml: Two new species and new records of Notomicrus Sharp, 1882 (Coleoptera: Noteridae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guimarães, Bruno A. C., Ferreira-Jr, Nelson (2019): Two new species and new records of Notomicrus Sharp, 1882 (Coleoptera: Noteridae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4629 (2): 263-270, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4629.2.8
